title: A-Lists
description: An application that allows users to search a movie or show and to save the item to their watchlists sorted by streaming service.
technologies: React.js, auth0, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Mongoose ORM, MongoDB, Node.js, and Heroku.

title: Pill Box
description: An application designed to help caregivers efficiently manage the medications each of their patients need to take on a daily basis.
technologies: Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Sequelize ORM, Passport.js, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.

title: Google Books Search
description: An application built to allow the user to search for a book and to save any of the books to be accessed later.
technologies: React.js, Bootstrap, Google Books API, JavaScript, MongoDB, Node.js, and Heroku.

title: Workout Tracker
description: An application designed to allow users to keep track of their workouts and the exercises in each workout.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, MongoDB, jQuery, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, Path, and Heroku.

title: Budget Tracker
description: A progressive web application to keep track of additions and deductions to a budget.
technologies: MongoDB, Mongoose ORM, JavaScript, jQuery, Heroku, Express.js, HTML5, and CSS3.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: An application designed to allow users to search for the current weather and forecast in any city.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Open Weather API, Moment.js, and Github Pages.
